## uuid() function

Generate a quick, but not perfect, UUID

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function uuid(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string

UUID string

## Remarks

This method optimizes quickness as opposed to absolute collisionless UUIDs
